title: O'ways Teacafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Indian, International, Italian, Japanese, Raw, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: Located in Heritage House, teahouse and cafe serving a wide variety of cuisines, including vegan options. Has a calm, homey atmosphere. Offers live piano music.
streetAddress: 20 Dreyer Street, Shop 2, Claremont, Cape Town
